column4: Hi, ufw (the firewall) applies any new rules right away, right?
I believe so, you could probably check with sudo iptables -L
weird, I have allowed port 4444, but I can't seem to access it.  Can you please help me debug this? Here is iptable -L http://pastebin.com/d160537db
I'm sorry I'm not iptables expert :)
